script.name: Curricula: Create missing areas, majors and classifications
script.description: Create all missing academic areas, majors, and classifications that are used in the last-like student course demands but not present in the selected academic session.

script.name: Curricula: Import Course Projections
script.description:
This script imports course projections from a CSV file in the following format:
  1. The file must contain a header line with the classification codes, e.g., Area,Major,01,02,03,...
  2. Each line contains an academic area, a major, and a number of students for each applicable classification.
  3. If the major cell is empty, the projection is for the whole academic area
  4. There can be an optional column named Total at the end of the table which (if present) gets ignored.
  5. If the Total column is present and there is only a number in the Total column, the projections are set proportionally and to meet the total.
Example:
Area ,Major, 01, 03, 05, 07,Total
A    ,     ,100,100,100,100,  400
B    ,   M1,100, 50,   ,   ,  150
B    ,   M2,   , 50,100 ,   , 150
C    ,     ,   ,   ,   ,   ,  200
Total,     ,200,200,200,100,  900
